description: Try our easy to follow Spaghetti & Lentil-Packed Meatballs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta with meatballs,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Beef,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Spaghetti & Lentil-Packed Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper and cook pasta as per packet instructions.
Place lentils, beef mince, half the garlic cloves, half of the parsley, breadcrumbs and pepper to taste in a food processor and blitz until roughly combined.
Shape lentil and beef mixture into meatballs and place on prepared tray. Bake for 15 minutes or until cooked through.

Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a medium frying pan over medium heat. Sauté remaining garlic for 1-2 minutes, add Italian tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes or until reduced. Stir through cherry tomatoes, meatballs, spaghetti and remaining parsley and season with pepper to taste. Divide among serving bowls and top with parmesan to serve.
